content: Switch on your camera and peel a banana with your teeth.
Tell an erotic story to a photo of a celebrity.
Post your most embarrassing selfie
Hug the person on your left for 1 minute.
Imitate a horny dog.
Find out which person here smells best.
Describe the last sex dream you had.
Choose someone in the game who has to rant about something they love. The time is to be determined by a d20.
You can only respond with catcalling phrases until your next turn.
Switch outfits with the person on your left for a whole day.
Play the melody of a song (karaoke vid) only to sing the lyrics of a completely different song above that melody.
Tell us a secret someone else told you that you haven't told anyone else.
Wear a bra above a Tshirt and take seductive pictures.
Change into the sexiest outfit you have, than switch on your camera.
Tell everyone here one thing you like about their character.
Tell everyone here one thing you like about their appearance.
Swich on your camera and show everyone how you'd like to be kissed on your hand.
Switch your camera on and spell your name with your ass.
Google filthy/sexy nicknames and choose one as your server nickname for one week.
Speak english with a very bad german accent for the next 5 minutes
The person on your left has to slap you on the butt.
The person on your left has to gently whip you with a belt for half a minute.
Switch your camera on and twerk for half a minute.
Switch your camera on and undress except your underwear.
Give something to your left neighbor, mouth to mouth.
Lapdance on top of your left neighbor for half a minute.
Call the fifth person in your call history and just laugh in the phone, than after 10 seconds of laughter, hang up.
Show everyone your screen and slowly scroll through your gallary.
Switch you camera on and mime a blowjob using a banana or other similar object.
Show the first picture you took with your cell phone.
Show the last picture you deleted, if available. Else, show the first picture you took with your cell phone.
Choose a celebrity and act like that celebrity for 1 hour.
Choose a fictional chararacter and act like that character for 1 hour.
Take a picture in which you use a piece of clothing in a completely wrong way. For example: use your pants as a shirt.
Use the first word of the last five messages you sent to construct a short story.
Take a picture on which you strike a pose that could only fit a nude (or thirsttrap). Clothes are allowed.
